Collaboration and communication.Beginner: I work together with my team members to complete the testing tasks assigned to me. I interact with them as needed to execute the prescribed test cases according to requirements.
Collaboration and communication.Advanced Beginner: I regularly share testing status updates, test results, bug reports and other relevant information across the broader project team. I provide these updates to report on progress made, convey any blocking issues, and communicate risks or test gaps that emerge.
Collaboration and communication.Intermediate: I frequently coordinate with team members across multiple functions like development, product management, and program management. I work to continually improve integration between teams, increase efficiency of our testing efforts, and promote full transparency into test status across the initiative.
Collaboration and communication.Advanced: I engage with and present to senior business stakeholders and company executives to influence them to adopt a quality-focused mindset. I advise them directly on the importance of sufficient testing and help shape testing culture from the top down.
Collaboration and communication.Expert: I spearhead industry dialogue through public speaking at conferences, and authoring online posts. I actively use my platform to advance the software testing profession by promoting best practices and innovations.

Understanding Requirements.Beginner: I am still learning the system and require very detailed step-by-step overviews of requirements along with acceptance criteria.
Understanding Requirements.Advanced Beginner: I am able to take requirements and fill in some technical gaps but still require defined acceptance criteria.
Understanding Requirements.Intermediate: I can implement requirements both to the letter and spirit of acceptance criteria as well as fill in gaps as necessary. I ask good questions during requirements grooming, however I sometimes fail to identify the real problem and can be taken down rabbit trails.
Understanding Requirements.Advanced: I frequently provide the project with simpler optimized requirement alternatives. I am comfortable communicating project needs to developers and design constraints to users. I am able to effectively break down large requirements by domain.
Understanding Requirements.Expert: I am able to anticipate the organizationâ€™s needs and can improve grooming to suit it. I'm capable of building roadmaps that balance technical efficiency with maximum value.

Technical skills.Beginner: I have fundamental knowledge of standard testing tools and techniques but need guidance applying them effectively. I have theoretical awareness but limited practical experience.
Technical skills.Advanced Beginner: I have used common test automation frameworks and tools for simple use cases. I can automate basic test scripts with assistance. I understand the purpose but have operated within narrow domains.
Technical skills.Intermediate: I have applied test automation, security testing, performance testing, and other practices across various types of systems and situations. I have implemented test harnesses and frameworks tailored to project needs.
Technical skills.Advanced: I have designed and implemented sophisticated test infrastructure and capabilities across multiple disciplines, types of testing and technology stacks for large-scale programs.
Technical skills.Expert: I am an acknowledgeable across the full spectrum of leading-edge testing tools, techniques, and emerging technologies. I am typically on the bleeding edge of innovation.

AWS Cloud Knowledge.Beginner: I am capable of explaining the basic benefits of cloud computing and AWS with simplified vocabulary. I am familiar with fundamental AWS services and can complete basic tasks like launching and connecting to an EC2 instance.
AWS Cloud Knowledge.Advanced Beginner: I am able to describe the Well-Architected Framework principles and create straightforward VPCs and container deployments using essential AWS services. I am starting to apply my knowledge to build basic solutions.
AWS Cloud Knowledge.Intermediate: I can fluently identify anti-patterns against the Well-Architected Framework. I am skilled in using a range of AWS services to automate workflows, secure applications, and deploy infrastructure as code.
AWS Cloud Knowledge.Advanced: I am adept at designing robust solutions using a variety of AWS services and features. I can optimize cost and performance and extend AWS services programmatically at an advanced level. I can adapt my communication style for technical and non-technical audiences.
AWS Cloud Knowledge.Expert: I am highly capable in designing fault-tolerant, enterprise-grade architectures on AWS. I can diagnose and resolve complex technical issues and deliver highly secure, compliant solutions optimized for performance and cost. I can communicate and explain AWS solutions to both technical and business stakeholders clearly and effectively.

Test planning and estimation.Beginner: I can execute prescribed test plans and test cases provided to me. I have limited experience estimating testing efforts.
Test planning and estimation.Advanced Beginner: I can estimate testing efforts for small, well-defined workstreams based on some past experience. I understand factors that can impact test planning.
Test planning and estimation.Intermediate: I optimize testing coverage and effectiveness through risk and requirement analysis and input from others. I can handle test planning for medium projects.
Test planning and estimation.Advanced: I strategize comprehensive test planning at the program and portfolio level to maximize value. I am comfortable estimating large-scale initiatives.
Test planning and estimation.Expert: I pioneer innovative testing approaches and models for accurate test planning and estimation.

Testing process and methodology expertis.Beginner: I have fundamental knowledge of standard software testing processes and methodologies but require guidance to execute them effectively. I understand the overall purpose but lack deep experience.
Testing process and methodology expertis.Advanced Beginner: I have worked within defined testing processes and can recommend minor improvements based on training and initial exposure to best practices. I understand how to operate within established structures.
Testing process and methodology expertis.Intermediate: I have led multiple testing initiatives using various standard methodologies. I can design efficient and tailored testing processes aligned to specific team capabilities and project needs.
Testing process and methodology expertis.Advanced: I have expertise implementing and optimizing testing processes across diverse large-scale programs and organizations. I lead selection, customization and continuous improvement of best-fit testing methodologies.
Testing process and methodology expertis.Expert: I am an industry-wide thought leader and innovator when it comes to pioneering new software testing processes and methodologies. I have created revolutionary approaches that have positively disrupted the field.

Defect tracking and analysis.Beginner: I follow standard procedures to log and retest defects found during testing activities.
Defect tracking and analysis.Advanced Beginner: I can analyze defects to help identify localized issues and make limited recommendations for improvements.
Defect tracking and analysis.Intermediate: I track quality trends across releases and lead root cause analysis resulting in more permanent solutions.
Defect tracking and analysis.Advanced: I enrich organizational defect data to enable predictive models. I drive process improvements through deep data analysis.
Defect tracking and analysis.Expert: I pioneer innovative techniques in defect prevention, prediction and analysis using cutting edge data science.

Domain knowledge.Beginner: I have gained familiarity with the fundamentals of my team or company's business domain space.
Domain knowledge.Advanced Beginner: I apply domain knowledge to design more meaningful test cases aligned to how the software is used.
Domain knowledge.Intermediate: I leverage broad domain insights to maximize test coverage of critical areas and flows.
Domain knowledge.Advanced: I engage with stakeholders strategically based on my deep understanding of company products, customers, markets.
Domain knowledge.Expert: I am regarded as a foremost thought leader across dominating industry domains based on unparalleled knowledge.

Coaching and mentoring skills.Beginner: I buddy up with team members as needed to share my experience.
Coaching and mentoring skills.Advanced Beginner: I provide tactical feedback and training to help teammates improve their skills.
Coaching and mentoring skills.Intermediate: I cultivate testing skills across the team through organized mentoring, workshops and training.
Coaching and mentoring skills.Advanced: I nurture high-performing teams by motivating, inspiring and empowering people to advance their careers.
Coaching and mentoring skills.Expert: I am sought out across the industry as an inspirational mentor able to profoundly impact careers and develop future leaders.

Technology and tool skills.Beginner: I have fundamental skills to use standard testing tools and technologies.
Technology and tool skills.Advanced Beginner: I can script tests for efficiency using standard languages like Python and Selenium.
Technology and tool skills.Intermediate: I automate sophisticated test suites across diverse tools, custom frameworks and scripting.
Technology and tool skills.Advanced: I pioneer new test automation capabilities, tools and scripting APIs tailored to team needs.
Technology and tool skills.Expert: I am an acclaimed expert across past, present and future generations of test automation technologies.
